name: node-red-contrib-alexa-remote-fork

scripts.clean-docker: docker container stop $(docker container ls -q --filter name=node-red-contrib-alexa-remote-fork-develop) || sleep 1 && docker rm node-red-contrib-alexa-remote-fork-develop || docker rmi node-red-contrib-alexa-remote-fork-develop
scripts.develop: docker build -t node-red-contrib-alexa-remote-fork-develop . && DEV_CONTAINER=$(docker run --name=node-red-contrib-alexa-remote-fork-develop -d -it -p 3456:3456 -p 1880:1880 -v $(pwd):/data/nodes/node-red-contrib-alexa-remote-fork node-red-contrib-alexa-remote-fork-develop) && docker exec $DEV_CONTAINER npm install /data/nodes/node-red-contrib-alexa-remote-fork && echo "open http://localhost:1880 in the browser. To update the node, execute npm run-script clean-docker and then npm run-script develop"

description: node-red nodes for interacting with alexa
